#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t,N;
	cin>>t;
	while(t>0){

		t--;
		int flag=1;
		cin>>N;
		if(N%2==1)
			cout<<"BMEENA"<<endl;
		else{
			while(N!=1){
				
				if(N%2==1){
					cout<<"BMEENA"<<endl;
					flag=0;
					break;
				}
				N/=2;
			}
			if(flag)
				cout<<"BKUL"<<endl;
		}
	}
			
}
